body.body: A spacer plate and two bolt washers have been added to the left hand control plate on the above models from VIN 842556. The torque figure for the control plate’s fixings have also changed to
The spacer plate is fitted between the left hand control plate and the frame. The washers fit onto the fixings securing the control plate to the frame.
When ordering replacement parts, refer to the EPC
When ordering replacement parts, refer to the EPC.
Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information.

Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information. For electronic service manuals, store this information in a readily accessible place and refer to it often. This information will be included in the next service manual update.

title: Left Hand Control Plate
